mapper.insert: insert into movie (movie_title, movie_director, movie_producer, movie_acter, movie_genre,movie_plot, movie_grade, movie_time, movie_nation, movie_site, movie_date, movie_poster, movie_state) values (#{movie_title}, #{movie_director}, #{movie_producer}, #{movie_acter}, #{movie_genre},#{movie_plot}, #{movie_grade}, #{movie_time}, #{movie_nation}, #{movie_site}, #{movie_date}, #{movie_poster}, #{movie_state})
mapper.select: select * from movie order by movie_date asc
select * from movie where movie_title like concat('%',#{title},'%') order by movie_date asc
